detailsSection:
In 2021 the need for much improved IoT/OT cybersecurity has become even more clear with the recent and now famous attacks on network devices, surveillance systems, an oil pipeline and a water treatment facility just to name a few examples.

To better understand the challenges organizations are facing Microsoft partnered with the Ponemon Institute to produce empirical data to help us better understand the state of IoT/OT security from a customer’s perspective. This report provides many insights about the business criticality of IoT adoption and the challenges organizations are facing as well as the types of solutions organizations are looking for.
